languages.text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Применяет статус "Иммоляция". Иммоляция эквивалентна {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горению{/g} (8), но не может быть снята до конца боя. Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает в цель{/g}, цель должна выполнить {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}тест на стойкость{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}{/g} с бонусом +5 или стать {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенной{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Applies Immolation status that acts like Burning 8, but cannot be removed till the end of combat. When hit, target must perform Toughness (+5) test or be Stunned for 1 round.

Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Aplica el efecto inmolación. Inmolación es equivalente a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (8), pero no se puede quitar hasta el final del combate. Al recibir el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +5 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Aplica el efecto inmolación. Inmolación es equivalente a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (8), pero no se puede quitar hasta el final del combate. Al recibir el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +5 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 焼身ステータスを与える。焼身は​炎上効果と等しく、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}​炎上{/g}（8）を与えて、戦闘終了まで解除できない。命中した場合、ターゲットは+5の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}ボーナス{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 焼身ステータスを与える。焼身は​炎上効果と等しく、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}​炎上{/g}（8）を与えて、戦闘終了まで解除できない。命中した場合、ターゲットは+5の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}ボーナス{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: 施加“燔祭”效果，可以让被影响的角色获得{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（8）效果，且此效果在战斗结束之前无法移除。除此之外，带有“燔祭”效果的目标被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+5加值，否则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 施加“燔祭”效果，可以让被影响的角色获得{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（8）效果，且此效果在战斗结束之前无法移除。除此之外，带有“燔祭”效果的目标被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+5加值，否则会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Bewirkt den Status "Selbstverbrennung". "Selbstverbrennung" entspricht {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (8), kann bis zum Ende des Kampfes aber nicht entfernt werden. Wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +5 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bewirkt den Status "Selbstverbrennung". "Selbstverbrennung" entspricht {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (8), kann bis zum Ende des Kampfes aber nicht entfernt werden. Wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +5 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Applique l'altération d'état Immolation, un effet similaire à {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8), mais qui ne peut être dissipé avant la fin du combat. La cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +5. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Applies the immolation status. Immolation is equivalent to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Applique l'altération d'état Immolation, un effet similaire à {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (8), mais qui ne peut être dissipé avant la fin du combat. La cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +5. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Alevlere boğma etkisi uygular. Alevlere boğma, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (8) etkisine eş değerdir ancak çatışma bitene kaldırılamaz. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} +5 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}.
